title: Trump Lawyer Cleta Mitchell Escaped Georgia Indictment — and Still Leads Election Denial Movement
description:
Unencumbered by a fierce legal battle, Mitchell remains one of the most influential people in the movement that’s undermining American democracy.

The post Trump Lawyer Cleta Mitchell Escaped Georgia Indictment — and Still Leads Election Denial Movement appeared first on The Intercept.

title: The Biden Administration Is Keeping Thousands of Afghans in Limbo Abroad
description:
Human rights groups sued government agencies for information about Afghans stuck at processing sites while their applications to come to the U.S. are pending.

The post The Biden Administration Is Keeping Thousands of Afghans in Limbo Abroad appeared first on The Intercept.

title: White House Chief of Staff’s Wealth and Connections Collide With Biden’s Clean Energy Strategy
description:
Jeffrey Zients recused himself from dealings with his brother-in-law’s company, which is backed by the U.S. and a key player in green energy projects around the globe.

The post White House Chief of Staff’s Wealth and Connections Collide With Biden’s Clean Energy Strategy appeared first on The Intercept.
